title: 07/15/21 DPS Hour 1 Chris Mannix
itunes:title: 07/15/21 DPS Hour 1 Chris Mannix
description:
Chris Mannix talks to Dan about the missed call by referees in the NBA Finals last night. Chris says it is obvious that the ref did not want to foul Devin Booker out the game.
